data.title: GIRLS WILL BE:  Shorts designed to let girls be kids by Girls Will Be — Kickstarter
data.name: Girls Will Be
data.description: Because not all girls want to wear shorty shorts or skinny fits—or pink, ruffles, or bows. Help us change the world of girls clothing!

data.title: QUIRKIE KIDS - pink tees for girls AND boys by Martine Zoer — Kickstarter
data.name: Martine Zoer
data.description: QUIRKIE KIDS is a line of pink tee for girls AND boys with playful designs of things not normally associated with the color pink.
